main event: Military personnel observed a saucer-shaped object at Etain AFB, France on 11 July 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a grapefruit and white or light in color., The object was traveling straight and level before it blinked off to the North and never came on again., The sighting lasted approximately 25 seconds., Multiple reports from military personnel were documented regarding UFO sightings in the area., The object was confirmed to be associated with the Sputnik III satellite.
